name: Consequence Scanning Template
description:
Consequence Scanning is an Agile practice developed by doteveryone and TechTransformed. The exercise helps teams mitigate or address potential unintended consequences proactively.


In a Consequence Scanning event you will answer the following three questions about your product:

  1. What are the intended and unintended consequences of this product or feature?
  2. What are the positive consequences we want to focus on?
  3. What are the consequences we want to mitigate?


This template is meant to help facilitate the exercise, but the instructions can be found on doteveryone's site here: https://doteveryone.org.uk/project/consequence-scanning/
